tech circles was the Google's brilliant founders Page and Sergey Brin needed a business-savvy executive to help bring the company to the next level. But as Eric Schmidt put it in a Twitter posting on Thursday( Jan. 20) day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Instead, Eric Schmidt will take on the role of Google's executive chairman, where he says he will focus on broader business partnerships, technology leadership, product development and government outreach. executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google Inc. search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
